name: Magical Tiles Hop Ball 3d
description: Are you ready to kill your boring time. It’s time for all to Hop and start playing the game with the music on the go button. The Ball will jump on the beats drop. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles. Do not Tap. This is not a Tap Tap game. This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.
